actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should reimburse the Federal Government for the estimated $4,400,000 in costs incurred by the Office of Independent Counsel in investigating his relationship with Ms. Monica Lewinsky.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should reimburse the Government for the estimated $4.4 million in costs incurred by the Office of Independent Counsel in investigating his relationship with Monica Lewinsky.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should reimburse the Federal Government for the estimated $4,400,000 in costs incurred by the Office of Independent Counsel in investigating his relationship with Ms. Monica Lewinsky.
